document.title: SP718-Census of Agriculture Data Shows Growth of Value-Added Farm Enterprises in Tennessee

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: The United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) conducts a census of agriculture every five years. The most recent census was conducted in 2007 and results were released in February 2009. Over time, the census has included more and more questions related to marketing and alternative enterprises, and it now provides some information related to various components of value-added agriculture.
